Use median in API queries and health entities to find the 'middle' value from a sample, eliminating any unwanted spikes in the returned metrics.
Use percentile in API queries and health entities to find the 'percentile' value from a sample, eliminating any unwanted spikes in the returned metrics.
Use trimmed-mean in API queries and health entities to find the average value from a sample, eliminating any unwanted spikes in the returned metrics.
